attributes.action: British want Brexit supporter in government as prime minister as their voice.
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson was the true voice of the elected conservative government and has been betrayed by Michael Gove and the leadership team to make a sudden decision against the nations EU referendum outcome and it is strongly believed that the direction the Conservative party will take the country will be towards another EU agreement due to Mrs Mays outspoken support for the remain campaign.  The people of Great Britian have voted in the majority to leave the EU and concentrate on its own interests.
attributes.background: Michael Gove will not be elected by the people. Teresa May, a remain supporter and the people have no confidence that she will speak on their behalf from the heart of the nation and fulfil their wishes towards the rights of the country. It is clear that the current main parties are not fit to govern

rejection.details: As you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.
